name: Evasive Movement
description: Train in evasive maneuvers that allow you to avoid attacks while maintaining offensive positioning.

cards.title: Shoulder Roll Dodge
cards.description: A defensive maneuver that utilizes circular shoulder movement to evade strikes.
bulletpoints: Roll the shoulder back to deflect incoming force
Use the motion to transition into a counterattack
Keep the movement smooth and fluid
cards.summaryText: Roll the shoulder away to slip the strike and coil for an immediate counter.

cards.title: Side Step and Sway
cards.description: A lateral evasion technique that keeps you within range for a counterstrike.
bulletpoints: Step off the centerline while maintaining balance
Use body rotation to follow up with a strike
Stay light on the feet for quick re-engagement
cards.summaryText: Blend a lateral step with a torso sway to stay in range for rapid counters.
